title: Cortex Prime character
description: A JSON schema for a Cortex Prime character sheet

version.description: The version of the Cortex Prime character sheet schema used.

description.description: A one-line summary of the character.

name.description: The name of the trait set. Examples: “Distinctions”, ”Attributes”, ”Skills”, ”Values”, ”Signature Assets”…

style.description:
Optional: the visual style of the trait set. Default is “default”. Used as a CSS class name on the character sheet, e.g. `
…
`

location.description: Optional: the location of the trait set on the character sheet.

value.description: The die value of the trait.
